channel.title: Outlook on TLDRBins
channel.description: Recent content in Outlook on TLDRBins

item.title: Microsoft Oulook Email Folder
item.description: Open email file .pst .msg Tools sudo apt install readpst Basic # Convert to mbox format readpst <PST_FILE> # Open .mbox (plaintext) cat <MBOX_FILE> Read many emails # Install mutt sudo apt install mutt # Open in mutt terminal mutt -Rf <MBOX_FILE> +--------------------------------------+ | Note: Answer No to create /root/Mail | | | | Arrow : Move to the email | | Enter : View email | | q : back | | q again : quit | +--------------------------------------+ Tools # Install msgconvert sudo apt install libemail-outlook-message-perl # Install formail sudo apt install procmail Basic # Convert to .
